item.title: This Project Aims to Solve Some Problems...
item.description: Here I discuss what this project aims to solve and hopefully you can provide feedback, suggestions and any ideas!
item.content:encoded:
Here I discuss what this project aims to solve and hopefully you can provide feedback, suggestions and any ideas!

So, what's the issue? #
